name: Farmer Fran: Running Out of Sunlight!
name_original: Farmer Fran: Running Out of Sunlight!
description:
(Warning: Contains flashing lights from Day 6 onward.)

 (✿・◡・)  < (  Let's go~!  )

Oh no! a storm's about to hit the town on your first day as a farmer! Help Mayor Morrie's little town survive by farming as much as you can before the disaster hits and the plants run out of sunlight to grow.

Grow and harvest different kinds of crops before the storm, and collect items to help your fellow townsfolk with their dilemmas. They might even help you out if you get to know them more!

❀ Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys/Left click: Movement
  • Left click: Interacting with ｅｖｅｒｙ ｂｅａｕｔｉｆｕｌ ｔｈｉｎｇ~
  • Space/Left click: Advancing through dialogues
  • Scroll wheel/1 - 5: Cycling through seeds for planting
  • Shift + Esc: Exit the game ⁽ᵖˡᵉᵃˢᵉ ᶜᵒᵐᵉ ᵇᵃᶜᵏ! ꒰๑•̥﹏•̥๑꒱⁾
✿ Notes
  • Try talking to the townsfolk more than once everyday! (ﾉﾟ▽ﾟ)ﾉ
  • It might take a few seconds to load at the start. Please wait for a moment!
❁ Credits

Created in 3-ish weeks (supposedly for Ludum Dare 39, with the theme "Running Out of Power") by VeggieStew (Twitter | Facebook | Tumblr):

  • Mansagwan: Art
    • Twitter
    • Tumblr
  • OnionBlaze: Code, Music
    • Twitter
    • Tumblr

With voice acting by:

  • Dejeru (Twitter)
  • Weeby (Twitter)

(.=^・ェ・^=) < (  I hope you enjoy, meow.  )
